ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So will you not use your intellect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or at night. Then how is it you do not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and at night. Do you still not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And during the night; so do you not have sense?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And at night; will you not then reflect
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And at night; do you not then understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and in the night; will you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And at night-time; have ye then no sense?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and night: will you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And at night. Will ye not therefore reflect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and at night. Do you not exercise your reason?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And by night: will ye not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And at night; will you not then reflect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and at night, will you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And at night. Do you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And at night. Then will you not use reason?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:138] and at night: will you, O people of Mecca, not then understand?, what befell them and so take heed therefrom?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And at night time; have ye then no sense) do you not believe in what was done to them, such that you do not follow their example?
